Posts.Content: njbookwoman wrote: Registration is now open for the 5th annual Metastatic Breast Cancer Network National Conference which will be held on Saturday October 29 in Baltimore, MD.  Entitled "Empowerment through Education" the conference is being hosted in conjunction with the Johns Hopkins Avon Breast Cancer Center and will cover topics exclusively on metastatic, stage IV breast cancer. Excellent speakers, a variety of workshops to choose, plenty of opportunity for networking. There is no fee to register for this program. Free continental breakfast, lunch and reception are also included. For more information on agenda, speakers, hotel, directions, parking and scholarship availability go to: mbcnetwork.org/special-events/...  To register go to: events.r20.constantcontact.com...  Our website is: www.mbcnetwork.org Our email for conference questions is: jhu2011@mbcnetwork.org  Hope to see you in Baltimore on October 29, 2011! Dx 4/2/2009, ILC, Both breasts, Stage IV, Grade 3, 29/29 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- (FISH) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: MBCN Oct 29 Conference njbookwoman MJLToday

Posts.Content: Apr 22, 2012 10:40AM - edited Apr 22, 2012 10:46AM by njbookwoman So sorry to hear about Dana. Here is the link to the page to view Dana's Patient Introduction at the MBCN conference last year that some have mentioned. (Her video is toward the bottom of this webpage): http://mbcn.org/special-events/category/video-presentations/P6/  If you didn't know her, I think you will feel like you did after viewing this. Peace to Dana and her family and friends.
